name.zh_CN: Rambler: 分段阅读/精读/随机阅读

short.zh_CN: 漫步式阅读/随机阅读/细读/精读

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Random reader

Introduction
Save the uploaded txt file as a book and automatically cut it into paragraphs;
Each time you open the main page of Rambler, a paragraph of the latest uploaded book will be randomly displayed.

Usage
- Click the top left button to upload a txt file
- Refresh New Tab
- Click icon to view your book list and you can choose the current book by clicking one.
- Switch background color
- You can add some comments for each paragraph
- Share paragraphs or selected texts to social media
- View or modify your reading progress
- Switch reading mode
- WebDav sync, such as https://dav.jianguoyun.com/

Shortcut keys
- refresh: r
- Previous paragraph: ArrowLeft / ArrowUp
- Next paragraph: ArrowRight / ArrowDown
- To the start: Command / Windows + ArrowLeft / ArrowUp
- To the end: Command / Windows + ArrowRight / ArrowDown
long.zh_CN:
随机阅读器
QQ交流群: 278123076

简介
将上传的 txt 文件，保存为一本书，并自动切分为段落；
每次打开页面，都将随机显示最近上传的书某个段落。

用法
点击左上角按钮，上传 txt 文件
刷新 New Tab
点击扩展图标，查看你上传的书本，点击可以将其选中为当前展示的书本。
New Tab 右上角可以选择背景颜色
页面正下方 hover 可显示评论框及评论列表
查看或修改阅读进度
切换顺序阅读/随机阅读模式
分享到 twitter 或微博

快捷键 -- New Tab 需要先获取到焦点
刷新: r
上一段落: ArrowLeft / ArrowUp
下一段落: ArrowRight / ArrowDown
跳转到开头: Command / Windows + ArrowLeft / ArrowUp
跳转到末尾: Command / Windows + ArrowRight / ArrowDown
